title: @Maya Fey
body:
Inspired by your beard.


Edit: These people need to be done

I would **GREATLY** appreciate it if you linked me on what page your img is in the selfie thread. I know some of you cant stop posting for 24 hours so please do that for me so i can draw you. its 2 am and I have a hot date with a hot boyfriend. Have a great night, I'll work on these tomorrow.

-Besteau
